#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>

int is_leap(int year) {
    return (year %400 ==0) || (year%4 ==0 && year%100 !=0);
}

int main() {

    // First part:

    int N;
    scanf("%d", &N);

    int *n_array = malloc(N * sizeof(int));
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &n_array[i]);
    }

    // Compute a:

    int a =1;
    int pos =0;

    for(int i=1; i<N; i++) {
        if(n_array[pos] > n_array[i]) {
            a++;
            pos =i;
        }
    }

    // Second part:

    int temp_n = a;
    int x =1;

    while(1) {

        int exponent =0;
        while( (1 << (exponent+1)) <= temp_n ) {
            exponent++;
        }

        int subtract_val = 1 << exponent;

        if (subtract_val == temp_n) {
            break;
        }

        temp_n -= subtract_val;
        x +=1;
    }

    // Third part:

    int initial_n =x;
    int current_n = initial_n;
    int current_day =4; // 'f' is 4.

    char ans[3];
    if (is_leap(initial_n)) {
        strcpy(ans, "ly");
    } else {
        strcpy(ans, "nly");
    }

    while(1) {

        int is_current_leap = is_leap(current_n);

        int next_day;

        if (is_current_leap) {
            next_day = (current_day +2) %7;
        } else {
            next_day = (current_day +1) %7;
        }

        current_day = next_day;
        current_n +=1;

        if ( (current_day ==4) && (strcmp(ans, "ly")==0) && is_leap(current_n) ) {
            break;
        } else if ( (current_day ==4) && (strcmp(ans, "nly")==0) && !is_leap(current_n) ) {
            break;
        }
    }

    printf("%d\n", current_n);

    free(n_array);
    return 0;
}
